Body.Content:
We are announcing the ability to manually re-enable customer-managed keys locked environments will reach public preview starting on June 30, 2025, reaching all regions by July 30, 2025.

How does this affect me?
With this functionality administrators can manually re-enable locked environments directly through the Power Platform admin center. Additionally, administrators can identify which environments were deactivated due to unhealthy Enterprise policies and proactively manage these environments to ensure smooth operations.

What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

If you would like more information on this feature, please visit Lock and unlock environments through key vault access - Power Platform.

Title: Power Platform - Information regarding the ability to re-enable customer-managed key locked environments
